              Ã˜yvind Bugge Solheim
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        ðŸ¤—
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            My main homepage is found here. This page is
            only used for my library of LLM-written
            descriptions of my own code. I used to include it on my
            main site but Google found it and demoted the whole
            web-page. Accordingly, I moved it to a separate domain.
            I am a Senior Research Fellow at The Institute for Social
            Research (ISF) and the Centre
            for Research on Civil Society and Voluntary Sector. My
            research interests concern the the far right, social media,
            terrorism, but also the Norwegian civil society. I study
            Scandinavian right-wing extremism on social media as part of
            the FREXO-project. In addition,
            I was part of the research group at the Norwegian Holocaust
            Center studying antisemitism
            and islamophobia in Norway. In my PhD I studied how terrorist
            attacks affect attitudes towards immigration and immigrants.
            I have also worked for the secretary to valglovutvalget, the
            Norwegian Election Act Commission, which presented its
            report (NOU:2020:
            6 Frie og hemmelige valg â€” Ny valglov) on May 27,
            2020.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Ã˜yvind Bugge Solheim

              My main homepage is found here. This page
              is only used for my library of LLM-written descriptions of my own
              code. I used to include it on my main site but Google
              found it and demoted the whole web-page. Accordingly, I
              moved it to a separate domain.
              I am a Senior Research Fellow at The Institute for
              Social Research (ISF) and the Centre
              for Research on Civil Society and Voluntary Sector. My
              research interests concern the the far right, social
              media, terrorism, but also the Norwegian civil society. I
              study Scandinavian right-wing extremism on social media as
              part of the FREXO-project. In
              addition, I was part of the research group at the
              Norwegian Holocaust Center studying antisemitism
              and islamophobia in Norway. In my PhD I studied how terrorist
              attacks affect attitudes towards immigration and
              immigrants. I have also worked for the secretary to valglovutvalget, the
              Norwegian Election Act Commission, which presented its
              report (NOU:2020:
              6 Frie og hemmelige valg â€” Ny valglov) on May 27,
              2020.
